original_text: “Very truly I tell you Pharisees, anyone who does not enter the sheep pen by the gate, but climbs in by some other way, is a thief and a robber.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 문을 통하여 양의 우리에 들어가지 아니하고 다른 데로 넘어가는 자는 절도며 강도요

sentences.original_text: anyone who does not enter the sheep pen by the gate,
but climbs in by some other way,
is a thief and a robber."
